tapestry needle for weaving in ends abbreviations dpns double pointed needles co cast on pm place marker bor beginning of round mc main color cc1 contrast color cc2 contrast color 2 cc3 contrast color 3 begin ribbing using mc and smaller needles co 96 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches pm for bor k1 p1 across the round repeat for 3 more rounds 4 rounds total switch
